name: Seraphim of the End
description:
The end of the world is upon us! Gather as many lost souls as you can so that your angelic comrades may strike back and save the world! However beware, gather too few and all may be lost.

This game is a sidescrolling platformer where you need to collect "souls" to win, but beware, there is a wall of death that is chasing you, and if you touch it you are dead. So collect as many souls as you can while running from the wall and enter the goal at the end!

There is a total of 100 souls you can collect, and how many you get determines wheter the forces of the heavens win or lose.

In your arsenal you have some abilities, with your wings you can fly up high, the more souls you have the higher you can go! They also let you drift downward slowly.

You have also been armed with a special spear, while it may not be very deadly, you can transport yourself to it whenever you want! Mastering this is key to save as many as you can.

This game was made during a gamejam at our school

Controls:

A and D to walk left and right

SPACEBAR to jump in the direction of your mouse cursor

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to throw your spear

Q to teleport to your spear

ESCAPE to pause the game and bring up the menu

LOUD VOLUME WARNING, WE TWEAKED SOME SOUNDS A BIT WRONG
